Walkthrough

This Page

  • Show Source

Code¶

ros-cmake is in the ‘ros-cmake’ repository at https://github.com/straszheim/ros-cmake. The git clone url is git://github.com/straszheim/ros-cmake.git. Don’t run off and clone it yet; use the walkthrough. But dont do this yet, follow the directions below.

Just Run It¶

You can copy these lines one-by-one into a shell buffer:

mkdir tmp
cd tmp
wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/straszheim/ros-cmake/raw/master/run_full_build_from_scratch.sh
sh ./run_full_build_from_scratch.sh

And you’ll find the results in subdirectory work-cmake. See the walkthrough for more details and the manual version.
